amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to enter into contract with a government contractor that willfully or repeatedly violated the Fair Labor Standards Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act" and such disposition is listed as "willful" or "repeated".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A059) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 242 (Roll no. 354).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A059) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 242 (Roll no. 354).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Ellison.
